document_data.mainbody:
hartii Nung was a monstrous eel that dwelt in the Yellow Sea off the coast of Koryo in Kara-Tur. It was reported to be 100 feet (30 meters) long.
The mighty eel was caught by the famous Koryoan fishermen of Inani and Ansong.It is not clear whether the fishermen responsible came from Inani or Ansong, or both settlements.
